backup.title: Backup
backup.download: Download a backup file of your data to your device.
backup.upload: Upload a backup file with your data.

form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: You can use an event to highlight this day.
form.titleError: The field title must be filled.
form.contentPlaceholder: Feel free to express in your own way how your day was.
form.contentError: The field content must be filled.

footerDescription.description1: A simple app to keep track of your days, without carrying a notebook, and without uploading your stories to the cloud, all on your device!
footerDescription.description2: It started as a project to learn new technologies, and I thought it can be useful for somebody.

footerDev.description: If you want to contribute to this project, you can find the source code on

1.question: Whats the pourpose of this site?
1.answer: To provide a safe and private space for individuals to write about their thoughts, feelings, and experiences.

2.question: Is this site safe?
2.answer: Yes, your data is stored in your browser, and it is not sent to any server.

3.question: Can I use this site on my mobile/desktop?
3.answer: Yes, you can use this site on your mobile/desktop, it's a website :D, BUT, you won't have acces to your data from a different browser than the one you used to create it.

4.question: How many storage space do I have?
4.answer: You have as much storage space as your browser allows you to have.
